item.description:
The Outdoor track is opening up for the season this Thursday.  Let's hit it on Sunday.

Just Arrive and Drive.  All equipment and suits are provided on premises for no additional charge.

Two formats are available - the Race format on the quarter mile track, and the open lapping session on the mile long track.  You are welcome to choose what suits you the most - pricing and other information about the two formats can be got from here - http://f1outdoors.com/f1-outdoors-kart-racing-arrive-and-drive.asp

I'll see you at the track.

 

In the event of inclement weather, and the outdoor track is closed because of it, we'll meet at the F1 Boston indoor track - 290 Wood Road, Braintree, MA.

I'll send out a message on the day of the event based on update from F1 Outdoors and you can find updates as well by calling them at 508.350.1000

 

***** It's All A GO for racing today at 5pm - See you there *****
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet by the Registration Shack
item.name: Let's go Racing Outdoors
